newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo rubber futures weaker in sluggish trade.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo rubber futures weaker in sluggish trade.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended mostly lower on Tuesday, pressured by long-liquidation, particularly in nearby months, traders said.
Prices ranged from 2.2 yen per kg lower to 0.1 yen firmer. Benchmark March was 1.1 yen lower at 135.3 yen.
Activity was sluggish as private investors retreated to the sidelines ahead of the spot expiry on Friday, they said.

The market started the day narrowly mixed, and the spot October contract hit its life-of-contract low in the afternoon session. "The high levels of rubber stocks at home discouraged fresh buying,"one trader said.
